label: 右大將家政所
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
見出し読み: うたいしょうけまんどころ
説明文: The chancellery of Minamoto Yoritomo, established in 1191. In 1192 Yoritomo became shogun and established a shōgun ke mandokoro. From 1195 he reverted to the earlier form.　[源頼朝、将軍家政所]
